p: Cold-pressing and water distillation are commonly used methods for the extraction of essential oil from citrus peel. Cold-pressed essential oil (CPEO), a natural mixture of nonvolatile and volatile components, maintains the original composition and properties of phytochemicals. 7 Distilled essential oil (DEO) lacks the nonvolatile fraction, and its volatile composition varies as a consequence of exposure to different temperatures and acidities during distillation. 8
